ISSUE.TITLE: Bad element positioning in project page's sidebar
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: # Bug report - supabase dashboard - [x] I confirm this is a bug with Supabase, not with my own application. - [x] I confirm I have searched the [Docs](https://docs.supabase.com), GitHub [Discussions](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/discussions), and [Discord](https://discord.supabase.com). ## Describe the bug When scrolling with the [project page's](https://supabase.com/dashboard/project/_) sidebar you'll get confusing behaviour of the layout - something's wrong with the positioning of the logo. Such a small thing, yet so annoying. ## To Reproduce 1. Go to [a project in the dashboard](https://supabase.com/dashboard/project/_) 2. Scroll a bit with the side bar ## Expected behavior Good ux, no problems with the position of elements. ## Screenshots ![ss1](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/assets/151644171/e82fe684-0fdd-490c-8143-8021ef199449) ![ss2](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/assets/151644171/bf5b4d34-4988-494b-9b4c-a3a6b21b0a5e) ![ss3](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/assets/151644171/610c79bd-9340-4df4-9e3e-26c45e7678b0) ## System information - Browser: chrome

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix downgrade network error causing UI crash (#26919) * Fix downgrade network error causing UI crash * Ensure that all try blocks have at least a catch block and not an empty finally block * Update apps/studio/components/interfaces/Organization/BillingSettings/Subscription/PlanUpdateSidePanel.tsx Co-authored-by: Alaister Young <alaister@users.noreply.github.com> * Update --------- Co-authored-by: Alaister Young <alaister@users.noreply.github.com>
